origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.get_citation_format', 'description': "get APA citation format by an identification of organic result's id", 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of an individual Google Scholar organic search result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'citation', 'description': 'the citation format of the article'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. Put the location name at the end of the query.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search_term', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the place name'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'places', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the location.'}, {'name': 'latitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'radius', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'radius in meters.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'places', 'description': 'the list of places, each place is a dict with name and address, at most 5 places.'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_ticker_detail', 'description': 'Get a single ticker supported by Polygon.io, with detailed information about the ticker and the company behind it', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': ''}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'address', 'description': 'company address'}, {'name': 'homepage_url', 'description': ''}, {'name': 'description', 'description': 'A description of the company and what they do/offer'}, {'name': 'list_date', 'description': 'The date that the symbol was first publicly listed'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.search_stock_ticker', 'description': 'get the stock ticker given the company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'NewsAPI.get_latest_news', 'description': 'Get the latest news articles based on a query.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The query to search for in the news articles.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'articles', 'description': 'A list of news articles, each containing title, description, and url.'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我需要了解美元市场的货币政策变化。首先，获取近期美联储的货币政策变化新闻。接着，提供这些变化对美元汇率的影响数据。然后，请分析这些影响对中国投资者的潜在风险。最后，提供一些应对策略。
获取近期美联储的货币政策变化新闻
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
NewsAPI.get_latest_news
当前工具的参数'q'的值是什么?
Federal Reserve monetary policy

{'articles': [{'title': 'Federal Reserve Announces Interest Rate Hike', 'description': 'The Federal Reserve has announced an increase in interest rates by 0.25% to combat inflation.', 'url': 'https://example.com/news/fed-rate-hike'}]}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'articles': [{'title': 'Federal Reserve Announces Interest Rate Hike', 'description': 'The Federal Reserve has announced an increase in interest rates by 0.25% to combat inflation.', 'url': 'https://example.com/news/fed-rate-hike'}]}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
提供这些变化对美元汇率的影响数据
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
PolygonFinance.get_ticker_detail
当前工具的参数'ticker'的值是什么?
USD

{'address': 'N/A', 'homepage_url': 'https://www.federalreserve.gov', 'description': 'The Federal Reserve System is the central banking system of the United States.', 'list_date': 'N/A', 'name': 'Federal Reserve'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'address': 'N/A', 'homepage_url': 'https://www.federalreserve.gov', 'description': 'The Federal Reserve System is the central banking system of the United States.', 'list_date': 'N/A', 'name': 'Federal Reserve'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
分析这些影响对中国投资者的潜在风险
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
RiskAnalysis.evaluate_impact
当前工具的参数'impact'的值是什么?
Federal Reserve interest rate hike
{'risk': 'Increased interest rates can lead to a stronger dollar, making Chinese investments in USD assets more expensive and potentially reducing returns for Chinese investors.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'risk': 'Increased interest rates can lead to a stronger dollar, making Chinese investments in USD assets more expensive and potentially reducing returns for Chinese investors.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?

prediction: 分析这些风险对中国投资者的潜在风险。
